title: Help Please
content:
I used to use this font for everything to do with a past website but now I no longer have it and would really like to know what font it is. If you could tell me that'd be awesome.

Here's a picture of it:

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20100201070648im_/http:/typophile.com/files/24_6265.png)
author: lsbigbro11

comments.content: That's just a crappy grunged version of Helvetica Bold. I've seen it once before, and I think it's downloadable from Dafont. It would look much better if you did it yourself.

Don't really know where to start on this one. Thanks for the double post and why not post this on the 'Type ID' board?

Frode is right... it's an awful freebie on dafont. Look under 'Fancy-Distorted'. It's not really difficult to find.

[[http://www.dafont.com/font.php?file=base\_02&page=1&nb\_ppp\_old=10&text=EPISODE+24&nb\_ppp=10&psize=l&classt=alpha|Base 02]]. I suggest distressing the type yourself ( [example](http://web.archive.org/web/20100201070648/http:/fontfeed.com/archives/tip-the-wornweatheredstamped-look/)).
